home.title: AVEPG - Association of Vintage Vehicles of the Pays de Gex

welcome.title: Welcome to AVEPG
welcome.intro: Welcome to the AVEPG website - Association of Vintage Vehicles of the Pays de Gex. Founded in 1991, AVEPG brings together enthusiasts and owners of vintage vehicles, with the mission to preserve, promote and share our region's automotive heritage.
welcome.description: The association organizes monthly friendly rides, fostering exchanges and discovery, and hosts the annual Gex Retromobiles show, an unmissable event for all vintage vehicle enthusiasts.
welcome.callToAction: Join us to experience and share together the passion for vintage automobiles!

about.title: About
about.description: Presentation of the association, its history, board members, and our partners

events.description: Calendar and events organized by the association, news and information about the Gex Rétromobiles show

photos.description: The association's photo gallery featuring our best moments

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: A form to contact the association and get more information

presentation.title: Presentation of the association and its goals
presentation.founded: Founded on May 29, 1991, AVEPG brings together passionate collectors of vintage vehicles, all brands and all eras combined. Affiliated with the FFVE (French Federation of Vintage Vehicles), the association aims to unite owners and enthusiasts of vintage vehicles to preserve, transmit and share automotive passion in the Pays de Gex.
presentation.members: Today, AVEPG has about 50 members, all driven by the same passion and desire to keep rolling heritage alive. Members enjoy meeting regularly to travel together hundreds of kilometers during friendly outings, exhibitions and local events.
presentation.valuesTitle: The association is based on essential values:
values: Passion for vintage automobiles and their history
Transmission of knowledge and heritage to future generations
Conviviality and pleasure of sharing unique moments
Mutual aid and solidarity between members
Openness to all enthusiasts, regardless of their vehicle
presentation.spirit: Each meeting is placed under the sign of conviviality and mutual aid, allowing everyone to share their knowledge, experiences and forge bonds of friendship around a common passion.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: AVEPG works closely with organizations and institutions that share our passion for automotive heritage and support our activities.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the AVEPG association. Whether you have questions about our activities, want to join us, or need information about vintage vehicles, we'd be happy to help!
